item.title: Clint the Stranger
item.description: Clint the Stranger, also known as Clint the Nevada's Loner, Nevada Clint and Clint, the Lonely Nevadan, is a 1967 Italian spaghetti western starring George Martin. A sequel entitled The Return of Clint the Stranger would follow in 1972.

item.title: Il momento di uccidere
item.description: The Moment To Kill is a 1968 spaghetti western film.

item.title: Halleluja for Django
item.description: La più grande rapina del West is a 1967 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Maurizio Lucidi.

item.title: Duel at Sundown
item.description: Duel at Sundown is a 1965 West German and Italian western film directed by Leopold Lahola.

item.title: The Big Gundown
item.description: The Big Gundown is a Spaghetti Western film directed by Sergio Sollima, and starring Lee Van Cleef and Tomas Milian.

item.title: Giarrettiera Colt
item.description: Garter Colt is a 1968 Italian spaghetti Western directed by Gian Andrea Rocco. It is one of the rare Italo-Westerns with a woman as lead character and was shot in Sardinia at a town named San Salvatore di Sinis.
